as it is.translation[0].definitions[0].d: because of the situation that actually exists – used when that situation is different from what you expected or needed
as it is.translation[0].definitions[0].e: They hoped to finish the kitchen by Friday, but as it is they’ll probably have to come back next week.
as it is.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Just keep quiet – you’re in enough trouble as it is.
